questions.question: 森林伐採は多くの動物の（＿）を奪うことになる。
questions.hint:
生息地せいそくち (seisokuchi) – habitat
伐採ばっさい (bassai) – deforestation

explanation.correct:
Correct!
生息地せいそくち (seisokuchi) means 'habitat'. Deforestation removes the living environment of many animals.

  • 生産物せいさんぶつ (seisanbutsu) – products
  • 食料庫しょくりょうこ (shokuryouko) – food storage
  • 運動場うんどうじょう (undoujou) – playground

Sentence meaning: Deforestation deprives many animals of their habitat.

Incorrect. The correct answer is 生息地せいそくち (seisokuchi), meaning 'habitat'.

  • 食料庫しょくりょうこ – food storage
  • 運動場うんどうじょう – playground
